title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
writer: Chiwetel Ejiofor, William Kamkwamba, Bryan Mealer
short_cast: Maxwell Simba, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Aïssa Maïga, Lily Banda, Lemogang Tsipa, Philbert Falakeza, Joseph Marcell, Noma Dumezweni
cast: Maxwell Simba, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Aïssa Maïga, Lily Banda, Lemogang Tsipa, Philbert Falakeza, Joseph Marcell, Noma Dumezweni
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Family Features, Movies Based on Real Life, US Movies, Movies Based on Books, Dramas, Independent Movies
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: Inspired by a science book, 13-year-old William Kamkwamba builds a wind turbine to save his Malawian village from famine. Based on a true story.
